channel.title: SumiaGaming~ High rates, Daily updates<--{For-Real} RSC without the boring parts
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img528.imageshack.us/img528/8831/sumiagaming2.jpg[/img][/center] [center][img]http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/8554/doublerainbow.jpg[/img][/center] [center]Best attempt to unlock DOUBLE RAINBOW 12/20 unique players at same time online ![/center]
[center]~ Runescape [i]Classic[/i] ~[/center] [center]~ {S}hut {U}p {M}om {i} {A}m {G}aming ~[/center]
[i]Information[/i] : Rates, x20 ~ First week Rates, x15 ~ Second week Rates, x10 ~ Third and fourth week Rates, x5 ~ 100% Release Rates, x10 ~ 100% Release weekends
[i]Location[/i] : www.sumiagaming.com
[i]Download[/i] : [url=http://uppit.com/94vyzg33qneo/SumiaGaming_RSC_v0.1.rar]Sumiagaming v0.1[/url]
[i]News[/i] : Server went public 28-11-2010 New Website is online 29-11-2010 [ Still under maintenance ]
[i]Staff[/i] : Sumia - Administrator / coder RSC Slit Wrists - Coder 508 I x u b 3 r - Web developer Mod Mike - PlayerModerator ~Open~ - EventModerator
[i]Why SumiaGaming[/i] : - 24/7 Host, 120MPBs - Dedicated webhost - New community with multiple games
[i]Daily updates[/i] : [url=http://sumiagaming.com/mybb/showthread.php?tid=11&pid=15#pid15] Click here [/url]
[i]Events[/i] : [url=http://sumiagaming.com/mybb/showthread.php?tid=2] Click here [/url]
[i]Event winners[/i] [url=http://sumiagaming.com/mybb/forumdisplay.php?fid=23] Click here [/url]
[i]Screenshots[/i] : [URL=http://img406.imageshack.us/i/onlinetime.jpg/][IMG]http://img406.imageshack.us/img406/4421/onlinetime.jpg[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://www.speedtest.net][IMG]http://www.speedtest.net/result/1059997963.png[/img][/URL]
[i]Video's[/i] : ~ Video update 1-12-2010 KBD http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pJ5tJkI8YPA [i]Ventrilo[/i] : ~ Coming soon

item.title: SumiaGaming~ High rates, Daily updates<--{For-Real} RSC without the boring parts
item.dc:creator: @dragonlord dragonlord
item.description:
@dragonlord wrote:

[quote=“EndlessLife, post:40, topic:370936”][quote author=The_AFKer link=topic=467026.msg3424040#msg3424040 date=1291766654]
“Timmy you need to do your schoolwork…” - MOM
“SHUT UP MOM I AM GAMING!” - 10 year old Timmy. Founder of www.sumiagaming.com RSC / RS2 in one.
[/quote]
The_AFKer

PrO :He Afker u here?
PrO :U here?
PrO :hey?
PrO2 :Lets kick Afker… hes Leaching…
PrO :Ye wat a kid.
Afker : Hey why kicked me Q_Q MOMMY !!!

Nerd

–
Btw, i aint at school pwned.

Btw hes not a developer hes regular player.
Second of all i do not spawn any items to myself.
3th of all he did Scam so he gets wat he desirves.
4th i dont give a … about my grammar as you can understand everything i post.

What does 3th mean?

A scammer, gets treated the way he should be.[/quote]

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/3th

I see what you did thurr

Read full topic

item.title: SumiaGaming~ High rates, Daily updates<--{For-Real} RSC without the boring parts
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

[quote=“EndlessLife, post:43, topic:370936”][quote author=adu link=topic=467026.msg3424749#msg3424749 date=1291829107]
IMO, it is your fault for trusting him not to pot. Scam or no scam, its entierly your fault and jailing him is abuse because you should have seen it comming.
[/quote]
Scammings = Against the rules.
Its announced every two minutes.

Hacked

Who?[/quote]

Yes, I understand that it’s agaist your servers rules but think about it… does he really deserve to get jailed if you were stupid enough to fall for the trick six times? I understand if it was once or twice… but six? Was it the players fault that you didn’t check his stats through a view stats command after you lost the first time? Was it the players fault that the server devlopers can’t program a system to disable potting? No.

All it comes down to at the end is that he lied for pixels (sad) and you fell for the trick 6 times (even worse)…don’t hate the player, hate the game.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @inTouch inTouch
item.description:
@inTouch wrote:

[quote=“EndlessLife, post:35, topic:370936”]Well well the kids joining the topic, welcome have fun flaming if you do not understand what this is all about.

have fun, New released video about “The new World” is released on the topic of “The new World” Enjoy.

Sumia-[/quote]
Dear EndlessLife,

You are making biggest mistakes a rsc PS admin can make. Why the hell would you stake with your chars? 5 bucks on the fact that you spawn continuously yourself rares and other items and then you lose them in stakes. After that you most probably suspect the other player of abusing a bug or cheating and ban/jail him. That’s called powerabuse, FYI.

And what’s with the Santa hat(first to 99 in any skill) event?
Little quote:

Attack : Ibcrootbeer Defence : Ibcrootbeer Strength : Ibcrootbeer Hits : Ibcrootbeer Ranged : Mamasboy Prayer : Masterpowers Magic : Cooking : Littepower Woodcutting : Littlepower Fletching : Littlepower Fishing : Lol_k Firemaking : Legit_Sumia Crafting : Mamasboy Smithing : Masterpowers Mining : Lol_k Herblaw : Agility : Thieving : Masterpowers
Isn't Ibcrootbeer one of the developers(or the only one) anyway?

Oh, and clean the fuck up your horrible grammar. It makes my eyes burn and gives me an urging will to shit knives.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @inTouch inTouch
item.description:
@inTouch wrote:

[quote=“EndlessLife, post:25, topic:370936”][quote author=masterpowers link=topic=467026.msg3419124#msg3419124 date=1291359922]
turned out to be a gai server i cleaned the admin so he kicks me and logged onto my character how sad?
[/quote]
Or you explain it the good way Masterpowers.

Step 1 . Started to Stake.
Step 2 . Made a rule not to POT
Step 3 . U Agreed
Step 4 . I lost 6 Stakes, trusting u did not Pot.
Step 5 . I kicked u after the stakes, and Looked if you didnt ‘‘SCAM’’ Me wich u did.
Step 6 . Jailed ur character, wich should’ve been a Ban if i would’ve been hard for u.

“Autoing,Racism,Scamming,Exploiting Results into being BANNED”

It was ur chooice to attempt to scam me… The server owner? You risk it, i make sure to see if u are a scammer and u were caught.[/quote]You’re a fucking retard, bro.

Read full topic
